allow:
Bash(# Convert to base64 with proper syntax
base64 -i /tmp/template_bg.png -o /tmp/template_bg.b64

# Check the size of base64
wc -c /tmp/template_bg.b64

# Create a data URL (show first 200 chars)
echo -n ""data:image/png;base64,"" > /tmp/template_dataurl.txt
cat /tmp/template_bg.b64 >> /tmp/template_dataurl.txt
head -c 200 /tmp/template_dataurl.txt)
